name: Deadcibles
description:
An ai controlled avatar has been created in a simulation to provide
information on on a new wave of hearing devices that will hit the market soon.

this avatar is you.

this simulation is more real than you think.

don’t let the decibels get too high and
the frequency kill you.

you can only use each zone once.

don’t step out of the msazes bounds.

be careful.
